text: 2005 Aug 22. "#Chloroquine...potent inhibitor of #SARS #coronavirus infection...preventing the spread of #SARSCoV in cell culture. Favorable inhibition of virus spread was observed when the cells were either treated...prior to or after SARS CoV infection." https://t.co/pNZqrHouho https://t.co/8qSRlwNrLI
